title: 17-year-old shot in both legs in Trenton, cops say
content:
TRENTON -- Trenton police are investigating after a 17-year-old boy was wounded in a shooting late Tuesday.
Police were called to Capital Health Regional Medical Center at around 10:11 p.m. after a gunshot victim had been dropped off, Lt. Stephen Varn said.
The teen had gunshot wounds to both legs and underwent surgery. He is in stable condition, Varn said.
The Shooting Response Team is still trying to determine the location of the shooting. No suspect or motive has been identified so far.
